articles.title: ‘It’s a weird world’: TV host reacts to learning he is on RFK Jr.’s VP shortlist - CNN
articles.description: TV host and activist Mike Rowe speaks with CNN’s Erin Burnett about the conversation he had with independent presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. about running for political office.
